Articles.Content:
This is a thread for stock space station parts to be added to the game. This to make space station look more like space stations .

I have some ideas. But i suck with setting down images/photos, so here they are.

Z1 Hexagonal Truss

Manufacturer: Maxo Construction Toys

Size:1.5m (2m in real life.)

Description: This was a end result of when we stretched a HECS probe core and striped it of it's electronic equipment.

This was still described by Jebediah Kerman as a important structural component for space stations.

Attachment nodes: 6 points, 4 on the center of the truss, and 2 on both ends

Z2 Hexagonal Truss Small Adapter

Manufacturer: Maxo Construction Toys

Size:1.5m to 1m sizes

Description: An adapter for Z1 Truss to 1m parts.

Attachment nodes: 2 Points, on the ends

Z3 Hexagonal Truss Large Adapter

Manufacturer: Maxo Construction Toys

Size:1.5m to 2m sizes

Description: An adapter for Z2 Truss to 2m parts.

Attachment nodes: 2 Points, on the ends

seems like a nice idea but i think some kind of *usefull* (dont take it as i say your parts suggestions are useless) like more crew modules, solar pannels and radiators (station themed RTG?) also more propulsion would be perfect and boosters! cant have enough boosters! also more probe sized parts would be perfect structural parts are a nice idea too!
We'll undoubtedly get more station/base parts at some point in time. Especially after they rework IVAs to where you wan actually wander about the inside of parts. Can't wait~

Maybe a large sized hub point? so you don't have to put a adapter.

Features to EVAs to make your ISS construction alot like ISS construction?
